solution_line_template: He spends ${cost_per_snake}/snake * {num_snakes} snakes = $<<{cost_per_snake}*{num_snakes}={snake_monthly}>>{snake_monthly} to feed his snakes every month
He spends ${cost_per_iguana}/iguana * {num_iguanas} iguanas = $<<{cost_per_iguana}*{num_iguanas}={iguana_monthly}>>{iguana_monthly} to feed his iguanas every month
He spends ${cost_per_gecko}/gecko * {num_geckos} geckos = $<<{cost_per_gecko}*{num_geckos}={gecko_monthly}>>{gecko_monthly} to feed his geckos every month
So overall he spends ${snake_monthly} + ${iguana_monthly} + ${gecko_monthly} = $<<{snake_monthly}+{iguana_monthly}+{gecko_monthly}={total_monthly}>>{total_monthly} to feed all his pets every month
Therefore every year pet food costs him ${total_monthly}/month * {months_per_year} months = $<<{total_monthly}*{months_per_year}={total_yearly}>>{total_yearly}
